title: 33% - calculating diferences
body:
**Does anyone here know how to permanently solve this problem, bug or whatever it is?**

I'm having this trouble for one month, it happened 4 times in this 23 days of March. Every time i have to delete projects, sometimes option "repair" corect the bug, but I had leaver ban on 20 min few times, becouse of that and I lose Lp every time...It usualy happen when my team chose champs and game is about to begin. When the game should start, and displays a screen with teams and start to load, suddenly froze, I do not know if it will be loaded or not, actually, I do not know whether it is frozen or not until I restart the League of Legends Client . Only then I can see that 33% bug happened again 33%. Just to informe I have completly reinstal League of Legends after second time that I had that problem. 

If anyone can help me solve this problem I would really appreciate it a lot.
Thank you in advance,
_Serbian Summoner_

replies.body:
If the champion loading screen seems to stops loading and you get stuck on a certain percentage, there's a good chance your network connection became unstable. Without a stable connection to our game servers, you won't be able to connect and the game will drop you out.

Follow the steps in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can keep you in the game.
